post.description:
Administrators can add a new permission to the specific user by providing permission details.

To add a specific permission, you must provide the item ID (Category Id, Schedule Id, and Dashboard Id) for the permission entity (SpecificCategory, SpecificSchedule, and SpecificDashboard).

parameters.name: apiUserPermissionAdd
parameters.description: Details about the permissions passed will be added to specified user id.

200.description: User permission has been added successfully

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

get.description: Administrators can get the list of permissions of the specific user.

200.description: List of user permissions has been retrieved successfully.

400.description: Invalid user ID.

delete.description: Administrators can delete the specific user's permission.

400.description: Permission id is empty

post.description:
Administrators can add a new permission to the specific group by providing permission details.

To add a specific permission, you must provide the item ID (Category Id, Schedule Id, and Dashboard Id) for the permission entity (SpecificCategory, SpecificSchedule, and SpecificDashboard).

post.description:
Users who have read access to the dashboard can export the dashboard to the export types (Excel, PDF, and Image) and get the exported dashboard as an array of bytes in response.

When exporting multi-tabbed dashboard in image format, the response bytes must be saved in ZIP format.

token_type.description: Type of token assigned by the authorization server.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

Message.description: Returns the message from the API.

TotalResults.description: Returns items count of the API request.

ChildItemId.description: Specify ID of the child dashboard.

IsPublic.description: Specify true to set the view as public

ViewId.description: Specify ID of the dashboard view.

CanDelete.description: Specifies the delete permission of the view.

CanEdit.description: Specifies the write permission of the view.

CanShare.description: Specifies the share permission of the view.

IsPublic.description: Returns true, if the view is public.

ItemId.description: Specifies the ID of the dashboard.

UserId.description: Specifies the ID of the user.

ViewId.description: Specifies the ID of the view.

ViewName.description: Specifies the name of the view.

ApiCopyItemResponse.description: Response details of the copied item.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

Version.description: Returns the version number of the item

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

IsPublic.description: Specify true to set the item as a public.

IsCopyDatasource.description: Copy the data source of dashboard based on this value

ItemName.description: Item name. Valid values: `"Category name"` `"Dashboard name"` `"Data source name"` `"Schedule name"` `"Slideshow name"`

CategoryName.description: Category name should be provided if the item type is `"Dashboard"`

HomepageName.description: Specify the name of the pinboard

Pininfo.description: Provide the list of Widget IDs, Widget Names, and Dashboard IDs to add the pinboard.

WidgetName.description: Specify the Widget Name to add within the pinboard.

WidgetId.description: Specify the Widget ID to add within the pinboard.

DashboardId.description: Specify the Dashboard ID where the widget exists.

HomepageName.description: Specify the name of the copy pinboard.

TargetHomepageName.description: Specify the name of the pinboard which is needed to copy.

TargetUserEmail.description: Specify the mail id of the user from where the pinboard is to be copied.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Data.description: Returns the pinboard id from the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

SiteIdentifier.description: Site Identifier (Not required for external publish type)

Email.description: Email address of the user (Email required only in [Email required](/embedded-bi/site-administration/account-settings/#email-required) mode)

Password.description: Password of the user (Password accepted only in [Automatic activation](/embedded-bi/site-administration/account-settings/#automatic-activation) mode)

IsActive.description: Returns true, if the user is an active user

UserStatus.description: Returns the status of the user

Value.description:
Site settings value.

 Valid values: `OrganizationName` `SiteUrl` `DataLanguage` `TimeZone` are in `string` 

 `LoginScreenLogo` `EmailLogo` `EmailLogo` `FavIcon` are in `Base64EncodedString` 

 `ShowCopyrightInformation` `ShowPoweredBySyncfusion` `Use24HourFormat` `DisableUserPreference` are in `true` or `false` 

 `DateFormat` is in `MM/dd/yyyy` `dd/MM/yyyy` `d MMM, yyyy` `MMM d, yyyy`.

Site settings value.

 Valid values: `OrganizationName` `SiteUrl` `DataLanguage` `TimeZone` should be `string` 

 `LoginScreenLogo` `EmailLogo` `EmailLogo` `FavIcon` should be `Base64EncodedString` 

 `ShowCopyrightInformation` `ShowPoweredBySyncfusion` `Use24HourFormat` `DisableUserPreference` should be `true` or `false` 

 `DateFormat` should be `MM/dd/yyyy` `dd/MM/yyyy` `d MMM, yyyy` `MMM d, yyyy`.

FileFormat.description: Image format type. It must required when update image in site settings. Valid values: `svg` `png` `jpg` `jpeg`.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

MakePublicEnabled.description: Returns true, if the public dashboard setting is enabled.

DefaultViewsEnabled.description: Returns true, if the default views setting is enabled.

AutoSaveEnabled.description: Returns true, if the autosave filter setting is enabled.

ThemingEnabled.description: Returns true, if the dashboard theming setting is enabled.

UsageAnaylticsEnabled.description: Returns true, if the usage analytics dashboard setting is enabled.

MakePublicEnabled.description: Specify true to enable public dashboard setting.

DefaultViewsEnabled.description: Specify true to enable default views setting.

AutoSaveEnabled.description: Specify true to enable autosave filter setting.

ThemingEnabled.description: Specify true to enable dashboard theming setting.

UsageAnaylticsEnabled.description: Specify true to enable usage analytics dashboard setting.

CreatedById.description: Specifies the user ID of the item creator.

CreatedByDisplayName.description: Specifies the display name of the user who created the item.

ModifiedById.description: Specifies the user ID of the item modifier.

ModifiedByFullName.description: Specifies the full name of the user who modified the item.

CreatedDate.description: Date created of the item in string format.

ModifiedDate.description: Date modified of the item in string format.

ItemModifiedDate.description: Date modified of the item in date format.

ItemCreatedDate.description: Date created of the item in date format.

IsMultiDashboard.description: Returns true, if the dashboard is multi-dashboard.

IsFavorite.description: Returns true, if it is a favorite item.

IsPublic.description: Returns true, if the item is public.

IsDraft.description: Returns true, if the item is draft.

CanRead.description: Specifies the read permission of the item.

CanWrite.description: Specifies the write permission of the item.

CanDelete.description: Specifies the delete permission of the item.

CanDownload.description: Specifies the download permission of the item.

CanSchedule.description: Specifies the schedule permission of the item.

CanOpen.description: Specifies the open permission of the item.

CanMove.description: Specifies the move permission of the item.

CanCopy.description: Specifies the copy permission of the item.

CanClone.description: Specifies the clone permission of the item.

CanCreateItem.description: Specifies the create permission of the item.

WidgetInfo.description: Returns WidgetInfo for the specified dashboard.

TabDetail.description: Specifies the details of the tab in a multi-tabbed dashboard.

MultiTabDashboardId.description: Specifies the dashboard ID of the multi-tabbed dashboard.

DashboardId.description: Specifies the dashboard ID of the tab.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the tab.

CreatedDate.description: Date created of the item in string format.

ModifiedDate.description: Date modified of the item in string format.

IsActive.description: Returns true, if the user is an active user.

UserStatus.description: Returns the status of the user.

IsAzureADGroup.description: Returns true, if the group is added from Azure Active Directory

ApiDownloadCsvTemplate.description: Contains response of downloaded CSV template file.

Specify an entity of item for permission. Valid values: `"AllCategories"` `"SpecificCategory"` `"AllSchedules"`

`"SpecificSchedule"` `"AllDashboards"` `"DashboardsInCategory"` `"SpecificDashboard"`

ItemId.description: Specify the item ID while assigning permission to particular item. Valid values: `"CategoryId"` `"DashboardId"` `"ScheduleId"`

PermissionAccess.description: Specify an access type for item. Valid values: `"Create"` `"Read"` `"ReadWrite"` `"ReadWriteDelete"`

PermissionEntity.description:
Specify an entity of item for permission. Valid values: `"AllCategories"` `"SpecificCategory"` `"AllSchedules"`

`"SpecificSchedule"` `"AllDashboards"` `"DashboardsInCategory"` `"SpecificDashboard"`

ItemId.description: Specify the item ID while assigning permission to particular item. Valid values: `"CategoryId"` `"DashboardId"` `"ScheduleId"`

ApiScheduleRequest.description: Details about the schedule passed will be added.

ExportType.description: Specifies the export type to schedule the dashboard. Valid values: `Excel` `Image` `Pdf`.

StartTime.description: Specifies the UTC start date-time of schedule. The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`.

NeverEnd.description:
When set to true, it creates a schedule with no end.

 Note: By default, the NeverEnd is set to true. To set the end time for the schedule, fill the properties of either EndAfterOccurrence or EndDate; otherwise remains empty.

EndAfterOccurrence.description:
Specifies the number of occurrences after which the schedule will be completed. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will end after the completion of 5 occurrences.

EndDate.description:
Specifies the UTC end date-time of schedule, after which schedule will be completed.

The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`. For example: If you provide an end date-time, the schedule will end when the end date-time is reached.

UserList.description: Provides a list of email addresses or user IDs to the recipients who will get the schedules.

GroupList.description: Provides a list of group IDs to the recipients in the group list who will get the schedules.

ExternalRecipientsList.description: Provides a list of email addresses to the email recipients who will get the schedules.

ScheduleType.description:
Specifies the schedule type to schedule the dashboard. Valid values: `Hourly` `Daily` `Weekly` `Monthly` `Yearly`. 

 Note: If you choose the schedule type as `Monthly`, provide a value to the `MonthlySchedule` property, and leave the (HourlySchedule, DailySchedule, WeeklySchedule and YearlySchedule) properties empty.

IsEnabled.description: Returns true, if the schedule is enabled.

FailureNotificationToOwner.description: Returns true, if the failure notification to an owner is enabled.

FailureNotificationToRecipient.description: Returns true, if the failure notification to the recipient is enabled.

HourlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on an hourly basis.

DailySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a daily basis.

WeeklySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a weekly basis.

MonthlySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a monthly basis.

YearlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a yearly basis.

Size.description:
PDF page size.
Values allowed are A3, A4, A5, Letter

Orientation.description:
PDF page orientation.
Values allowed are Landscape, Portrait

Extension.description:
Excel or Image extension.
Values allowed for Excel file are xlsx, xls

Values allowed for Image file are jpg, png
Extension.default: xlsx for Excel and jpg for image

FtpURL.description: Use the FTP URL to save the exported file.
Use the FTP URL to save the exported file.

ApiHourlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on an hourly basis.

ScheduleInterval.description:
Specifies the hour interval. Based on this interval, the schedule will run continuously until the end time.

The format should be `HH:mm`.

ApiDailySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a daily basis.

RecurrenceType.description:
Specifies the recurrence type, whether the schedule recurs every day or every working day.

Valid values: `EveryNdays` `EveryWeekday`. Note: If you choose the recurrence type as EveryNdays, provide a value to the `EveryNdays` property, and leave the (EveryWeekday) property empty.

EveryNdays.description:
Specifies the day interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 2, the schedule recurs every 2 days.

EveryWeekday.description: For the schedule to recur every working day, set to true.

ApiWeeklySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a weekly basis.

RecurrenceWeeks.description:
Specifies the week interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 2, the schedule will recur every 2 weeks.

RecurrenceDays.description:
Specifies the list of days the schedule recurs.

Valid values `Sunday` `Monday` `Tuesday` `Wednesday` `Thursday` `Friday` `Saturday`. For example: If you provide `Sunday`, the schedule will recur sunday's of every 2 weeks.

ApiMonthlySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a monthly basis.

RecurrenceType.description:
Specifies the recurrence type, whether the schedule recurs on a day basis or on the customized day basis.

Valid values: `DayRecurrence` `CustomRecurrence` Note: If you choose the recurrence type as DayRecurrence, provide a value to the `DayRecurrence` property and leave the (CustomRecurrence) property empty.

DayRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the day specified on the month interval.

CustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the customized day of the specified month interval.

ApiMonthlyScheduleDayRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the day specified on the month interval.

DayInterval.description:
Specifies the number of day interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 10, the schedule will recur every 10th day.

MonthInterval.description:
Specifies the number of month interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 3, the schedule will recur 10th day of every 3 months.

ApiMonthlyScheduleCustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the customized day of the specified month interval.

WeekOfMonth.description:
Specifies the week of the month the schedule recurs.

Valid values: `first` `second` `third` `fourth` `last`. For example: If you provide second, the schedule will recur on the second week.

DayOfWeek.description:
Specifies the day of the week the schedule recurs.

Valid values: `day` `weekday` `weekendday` `Sunday` `Monday`

`Tuesday` `Wednesday` `Thursday` `Friday` `Saturday`. For example: If you provide Sunday, the schedule will recur on the second week of sunday.

MonthInterval.description:
Specifies the number of month interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will recur second week of sunday's of every 5 months.

ApiYearlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a yearly basis.

YearInterval.description:
Specifies the number of years the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will recur every 5 years.

RecurrenceType.description:
Specifies the recurrence type, whether the schedule recurs on a month basis or on the customized month basis.

Valid values: `MonthRecurrence` `CustomRecurrence`. Note: If you choose the recurrence type as `MonthRecurrence`, provide a value to the MonthRecurrence property, and leave the (CustomRecurrence) property empty.

MonthRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the month and number of years specified in `YearInterval` property.

CustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs in the customized month based on the number of years provided in the `YearInterval` property.

ApiYearlyScheduleMonthRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the month and number of years specified in `YearInterval` property.

MonthOfYear.description:
Specifies the month the schedule recurs.

Valid values: `January` `February` `March` `April` `May` `June`

`July` `August` `September` `October` `November` `December`. For example: If you provide April, the schedule will recur in April of every year. Here, the (year) is the value provided in the `YearInterval` property.

DayOfMonth.description:
Specifies the day of the month the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 20, the schedule will recur 20th April of every year.  Here, the (year) is the value provided in the `YearInterval` property.

ApiYearlyScheduleCustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs in the customized month based on the number of years provided in the `YearInterval` property.

WeekOfMonth.description:
Specifies the week of the month the schedule recurs.

Valid values: `first` `second` `third` `fourth` `last`. For example: If you provide second, the schedule will recur on the second week.

DayOfWeek.description:
Specifies the day of week the schedule recurs.

Valid values: `day` `weekday` `weekendday` `Sunday` `Monday`

`Tuesday` `Wednesday` `Thursday` `Friday` `Saturday`. For example: If you provide Sunday, the schedule will recur on every sunday's of the second week.

MonthOfYear.description:
Specifies the month the schedule recurs.

Valid values: `January` `February` `March` `April` `May` `June`

`July` `August` `September` `October` `November` `December`. For example: If you provide March, the schedule will recur on the sunday's of the second week of March every year. Here, the (year) is the value provided in the `YearInterval` property.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

ApiUpdateScheduleRequest.description: Details about the schedule passed will be updated.

ExportType.description: Specifies the export type to schedule the report. Valid values: `Excel` `Image` `Pdf`.

StartTime.description: Specifies the UTC start date-time of schedule. The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`.

NeverEnd.description:
When set to true, it creates a schedule with no end.

 Note: By default, the NeverEnd is set to true. To set the end time for schedule, fill in the EndAfterOccurrence or EndDate properties; otherwise they remains empty.

EndAfterOccurrence.description:
Specifies the number of occurrences after which the schedule will be completed. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will end after the completion of 5 occurrences.

EndDate.description:
Specifies the UTC end date-time of schedule, after which schedule will be completed.

The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`. For example: If you provide an end date-time, the schedule will end when the end date-time is reached.

ScheduleType.description:
Specifies the schedule type to schedule the dashboard. Valid values: `Hourly` `Daily` `Weekly` `Monthly` `Yearly`. 

 Note: If you choose the schedule type as `Monthly`, provide a value to the `MonthlySchedule` property, and leave the (HourlySchedule, DailySchedule, WeeklySchedule and YearlySchedule) property empty.

IsEnabled.description: Returns true, if the schedule is enabled.

FailureNotificationToOwner.description: Returns true, if the failure notification to an owner is enabled.

FailureNotificationToRecipient.description: Returns true, if the failure notification to the recipient is enabled.

UserList.description: Provides a list of email addresses or user IDs to the recipients who will get the schedules.

GroupList.description: Provides a list of group IDs to the recipients in the group list who will get the schedules.

ExternalRecipientsList.description: Provides a list of email addresses to the email recipients who will get the schedules.

RemoveUserList.description: Provides a list of email addresses or user IDs to remove recipients from the schedule subscriptions.

RemoveGroupList.description: Provides a list of group IDs to remove groups from the schedule subscriptions.

RemoveExternalRecipientsList.description: Provides a list of email addresses for removing email recipients from the schedule subscriptions.

DailySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a daily basis.

WeeklySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a weekly basis.

MonthlySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a monthly basis.

YearlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a yearly basis.
